channel.title: uu on Barefoot Rob

item.title: general assembly
item.description: 26-30 (or so) june 1999 written 7 July 1999 “How was Utah?” This is a common question posed by my friends, and I’ve not yet written my official definitive answer. For those of you thinking, “Utah?” here you go: I attended General Assembly, the largest Unitarian Universalist convention of the year. This year it was held in Salt Lake City. The week consists of lots of workshops, some worship, and plenary, where we as a democratic group decide what issues to focus our collective resources on.
